author: dreid
msg: This stops a small moan by the compiler.
h_errno is a global so it'll need to be made threadsafe.

author: ben
msg: Use the correct size for the pollset.

author: manoj
msg: Get rid of the per-connection name lookup on non-Unix platforms. This
